price: 68. (Lot) les dijo (antes de saber que sus huéspedes eran ángeles enviados por Al-lah): “Estos son mis huéspedes, no me avergüencen.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيۡفِي فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla inna hāulāi ḍayfī falā tafḍaḥūni
